title: How to Turn Off Inertia Scrolling on a Mac

steps.title: Click the Apple in the upper left corner of your screen followed by “System Preferences” from the context menu.
steps.content: Click the Apple in the upper left corner of your screen followed by “System Preferences” from the context menu.

steps.title: Click “Universal Access” option to open its preference pane.
steps.content: Click “Universal Access” option to open its preference pane.

steps.title: Select an option other than Inertia scrolling from the drop down menu beside “Scrolling”.
steps.content: Select an option other than Inertia scrolling from the drop down menu beside “Scrolling”.
